definition: helping someone grow up to be an accepted member of the community, to help develop, help grow
details:
noun
- helping someone grow up to be an accepted member of the community
= example: helping someone grow up to be an accepted member of the community
= synonyms: bringing up
- the properties acquired as a consequence of the way you were treated as a child
= synonyms: rearing, raising
verb
- to help develop, help grow
= example: to help develop, help grow
= synonyms: foster
- provide with nourishment
= synonyms: sustain, nourish
- bring up
= synonyms: parent
